Package com.g1.mychess.match.controller

Class MatchController

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.match.controller.MatchController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/matches") public class MatchController extends Object
Controller for managing match-related operations in the chess tournament system. Provides endpoints for matchmaking, match result processing, tournament finalization, match time updates, and match retrieval.

    • MatchController

      public MatchController(MatchService matchService, MatchmakingService matchmakingService, MatchResultService matchResultService, MatchTimeService matchTimeService, TournamentFinalisationService tournamentFinalisationService)
      Constructs the MatchController with the required services.
      Parameters:
      matchService - The service for managing match-related operations.
      matchmakingService - The service for running matchmaking.
      matchResultService - The service for processing match results.
      matchTimeService - The service for updating match times.
      tournamentFinalisationService - The service for finalizing tournaments.

  • Method Details

    • runMatchmaking

      @PostMapping("/admin/{tournamentId}/matchmaking") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> runMatchmaking(@PathVariable Long tournamentId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid MatchmakingDTO matchmakingDTO)
      Endpoint for running matchmaking for a specific tournament.
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament for which matchmaking will be run.
      matchmakingDTO - The matchmaking details, including tournament round and participants.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success of the matchmaking process.

    • completeMatch

      @PostMapping("/admin/{matchId}/status/completed/match") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> completeMatch(@PathVariable Long matchId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid MatchResultDTO matchResultDTO)
      Endpoint for completing a match and recording the result (winner, loser, draw).
      Parameters:
      matchId - The ID of the match to be completed.
      matchResultDTO - The result of the match, including winner, loser, and draw status.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the completion of the match.

    • finalizeTournament

      @PostMapping("/admin/{tournamentId}/status/completed") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> finalizeTournament(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid MatchmakingDTO matchmakingDTO)
      Endpoint for finalizing a tournament by processing its matchmaking results.
      Parameters:
      matchmakingDTO - The details of the matchmaking, including participants and rounds.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the successful finalization of the tournament.

    • getAllMatchByTournamentId

      @GetMapping("/all/{tournamentId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MatchDTO>> getAllMatchByTournamentId(@PathVariable Long tournamentId)
      Endpoint to retrieve all matches for a specific tournament.
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament to retrieve matches for.
      Returns:
      A list of all matches for the given tournament.

    • getAllMatchByTournamentIdAndRoundNum

      @GetMapping("/{tournamentId}/round/{roundNumber}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MatchDTO>> getAllMatchByTournamentIdAndRoundNum(@PathVariable Long tournamentId, @PathVariable Integer roundNumber)
      Endpoint to retrieve all matches for a specific tournament and round number.
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament.
      roundNumber - The round number to retrieve matches for.
      Returns:
      A list of matches for the given tournament and round number.

    • getAllMatchResultByTournament

      @GetMapping("/all/result/{tournamentId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<MatchResultDTO>> getAllMatchResultByTournament(@PathVariable Long tournamentId)
      Endpoint to retrieve all match results for a specific tournament.
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament to retrieve match results for.
      Returns:
      A list of match results for the given tournament.

    • updateMatchTime

      @PutMapping("/admin/{matchId}/scheduled-time") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateMatchTime(@PathVariable Long matchId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid UpdateMatchTimeDTO updateDTO, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Endpoint for updating the scheduled time of a specific match.
      Parameters:
      matchId - The ID of the match whose time is to be updated.
      updateDTO - The new scheduled time details.
      request - The HTTP request object (to capture additional request context).
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success or failure of the time update.

    • getTournamentResults

      @GetMapping("/tournament/{tournamentId}/results") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TournamentResultsDTO> getTournamentResults(@PathVariable Long tournamentId)
      Fetches the results of a tournament by its ID.
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - The ID of the tournament.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity with the tournament results.
